name: The Final Outbreak
description:
v1.001 updates:
You actually get to fight the final boss correctly
valuable lesson learned: play testing is relevant


// Controls

  • WASD: Movement
  • Left mouse: Shooting
  • Numbers(1,2,3): Changing weapons(Flamethrower unlocks at 300 points)
  • Holding Esc: Menu
  • SpaceBar: Saving//Music Selection In Music Menu
  • "R": Restart Room
  • "Z": Dialog Progress
  • Shift: Sprint

//Developpment
First starting out as a practice project to better learn Game Maker Studio, this project ended up becoming a rather complete 45-60 minute game. This is the most complex project I have developped yet. Therefore, many of my design decisions have revolved around teaching myself certain things.

All in all, with all the screen shakes, explosions and flaming zombies, I hope you enjoy playing it as much as I enjoyed making it

- If you are wondering why sound effects are lacking, you are welcome -

// Credits
